prompts: Create a mystical Pokemon that can manipulate dreams and has soft, flowing features.
I want a psychic-type Pokemon with a round body and a gentle expression.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies tranquility, with soothing colors and ethereal traits.
Make a unique Pokemon design that uses shades of purple and pink to convey calmness.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a dreamy appearance and can float gracefully in the air.
Design a creature that has a connection to sleep and dreams, with a fluffy texture.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like it could be part of a peaceful forest scene.
